author: David Traumann
comment: Seems like developer(s) don't care. No reply, no updates. Still waiting for battery, date and weather options instead of logo and also custom colors for the background. Disappointed. Meanwhile there are better and free watchfaces like this available. Don't waste your money on this one!
title: Don't waste your money, get it free

author: Ethan Taylor
comment: Changing stuff from the phone to the watch is blazing fast and stupid simple, not to mention the design of the watch face is just plain beautiful.   In the future I would like to see a little more functionality but this watch face is a must buy.
title: Great Design and Awesome functionality

author: David Taylor
comment: I've been contemplating the purchase of this watch face for some time and finally pulled the trigger. My initial thoughts are these: 1) it initially takes a little more than a glance to tell the time - when compared to traditional analog watches; 2) there should be the ability to copy colours from hour to minute or vice versa when theming them (for uniformity or continuity for those, like myself, who care); 3) I wish the hour/minute "hands" were the themed colour in ambient mode because the switch is noticeably distracting when it happens; and 4) like everyone else, I'd love the date and time in the middle to be a customization option. Outside of those things, this is an excellent and wonderfully unique watch face.

author: Gabriel Peal
comment: There are two major issues with VAtch on the G Watch R. 1) The anti-burn in moves the watch face around slightly. This causes the outer minute ring to appear thicker at some points than others. 2) There is already a minute ring on the G Watch R so it would make a lot more sense for the minute arrow to point at the minute ring on the watch instead of a second one on the interior.  I love the concept of this watch face but I just can't just it as my primary watch face because of those two  issues.
title: Unusable on a G Watch R

author: Abdullah Asif
comment: A very attractive watch face,kudos to the dev! However,the numbers are too small and kinda hard to read. Would love to have current numbers highlighted or more distinct.
title: A favourite but...

author: Martin Nuc
comment: Very nice looking. The only thing I would change is the outer circle showing minutes in the ambient mode. I would like it rather black despite I would loose minutes info.
title: Great skin

author: Lennex S
comment: Only things preventing 5 stars are customizable functions for the centre, for battery life or date. Seconds running around the minute dial would be a nice extra.
title: Great simple minimal watchface

author: Jack Ditty
comment: IT'S BEEN THREE  MONTHS NOW! Think the developer has just migrated to botswana. not full screen on the huawei watch. Only a small circle in the centre of the screen is showing. Please fix this!
title: Huawei watch problem

author: Sergio Vargas
comment: Only thing keeping it from 5 stars is that I wish I could make the center say the date/weather/etc with the new interactive faces
title: Beautiful!

author: Kevin Turner
comment: I'm using this with the Motorola 360 . Very clean face, well designed. It would be great if you can add the weather or other functions to the center of the watch face.

author: Elizabeth Rosenberry
comment: It would be nice to pit the date in the center and get rid of the logo. Also customizable backgrounds with photos and colors. Looks great on my Moto 360.
title: Works nicely

author: Andi Darmika
comment: Like the design so far. Need battery and date information, or at least make it an option
title: OK but more options required

author: balaji radhakrishnan
comment: Looks great..would be even better if you could add date or watch battery info!
title: Very attractive

author: Brian Izzi
comment: Would love the option for the date and for options to change the color of each set of numbers other than that great watch face

author: Adam Short
comment: I also love the idea of what someone else mentioned and having the option to have the date where the logo is.

reply.author: Mariux
reply.content: Hi Adam, we're already working to add the option to replace logo with the date!

title: Fantastic Design

author: Dinico Win
comment: But I want to be able to color the dial arrows. Because I want a solid black on my g watch r
title: I love it

author: Jan Ker
comment: I love it, but when  I change to dark theme after determine colors in light theme. the colors should be inverted.
title: Nice

author: Samuel Obirieze
comment: No recent update to improve face...
title: Update on replacing watch name with date

author: saul turner
comment: Nice very nice, like how you can change the colours of everything
title: It's good

comment: Only if can add batt indicator and date would be perfect
title: Great design

author: Jim L
comment: Needs an option for a date window? Where the logo is?

author: Honza Kotrs
comment: The date option would be much appreciated.
title: Smooth design!

author: William Curtis
comment: Looks great on my watch. Never been buggy.
title: Moto 360

author: Mike Castro
comment: Awesome but hands don't she on black background

reply.author: Mariux
reply.content: Hello Mike, you need to manually change the hands color to white when you select the dark theme.

author: Liam Terry
comment: Looks fantastic on my G Watch R
title: Love this

comment: Brilliant!

comment: Best best ever

title: Like it

comment: Looks great on my Moto 360.

author: Grant Butler
comment: Clean and simple, I like it.
title: Nice
